issueBody: Please upload the e-book file using the attachment option below, and then add any other information you would like to share.
bookshelfImportHint: Select EPUB/MOBI/AZW3/FB2 files from your device to add them to the bookshelf.
bookshelfEmptyHint: Your bookshelf is empty. Use the button above to import some books.
settingsModelPlaceholder: Model name, e.g. gpt-4.1 or doubao-1.5-lite-32k-250115
settingsApiKeyPlaceholder: Paste your OpenAI-compatible API key here...
settingsApiKeyHint: The key is stored only in this browser (localStorage) and used to call AI services from this device.
aiPanelNoApiKey: Please set your AI API key in Settings before using this feature.
